pt.com.gmv.lab.implant.rendering.surfaces
Class MarkerSurface

java.lang.Object
  GLSurfaceView
      pt.com.gmv.lab.implant.rendering.surfaces.MarkerSurface

public final class MarkerSurface
extends GLSurfaceView

The model rendering surface based on Open GL ES. It's main purpose is to draw models on top of markers and activating them when they're detected.

Since:
1
Author:
fao

MarkerSurface

public MarkerSurface(Context context,
                     Map<Integer,Marker> markers)
Creates a rendering surface for models.

Method Detail

activateMarker

public final boolean activateMarker(int marker,
                                    float[] modelView,
                                    float[] projection)
Activates a marker, setting its matrices and declaring it visible, so it can be drawn by the renderer.

Parameters:
marker - The marker identifier.
modelView - The model view matrix.
projection - The projection matrix.
Returns:
False in there's no marker with the given identifier. True otherwise.
